data.name: Murloc
data.description:
The Ancients - Murloc [R]
Units:
+5% damage
-30% buy cooldown
-3 hp regeneration

Buildings:
+10% attack rate

Upgrades:
+10% research speed

Magic:
Water Shackles (Slows enemy unit by 15%)
Rage (+15% attack rate for 60s)
Tidal Wave (Deals 100 damage in line)

Traits: Murlocs are a very ancient race of Azeroth which evolved to survive in Azeroth's dangerous aquatic environment.Ancient murlocs lived in the ocean's depths and therefore were never known to the world's early land-dwelling races. Though they are not very strong individually, they compensate it with their huge numbers and powerful sea sorcery

Difficulty: Advanced
Created: by Crow

auras.name: Trade Routes Aura
auras.description:
+30% move speed, x2 income from neutral buildings
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

auras.name: Corruption Aura
auras.description:
-8 unit armor, +100 range buldings
(does not affect Special unit)
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

auras.name: Neptulon's Blessing
auras.description:
Your units have 10% chance to gain a random bonus effect when they spawn from barracks

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

bonuses.name: Alpha Leaders [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Open Wounds

Murloc Alpha replaces Murloc Fighter
Melee Unit
+10% attack rate
+125 HP
Abilities:
Alpha Aura (Support Aura)
(bonus +8 attack in 700 AoE)
Upgrades used:
Finmade Weapons
Murloc Scale
Water Synergy
Open Wounds
MRLGRL Dance

Type: Early Push / Unit Power

bonuses.description:
Murloc Space Marine replaces Murloc Spear Thrower
Range Unit (Mechanical)

-8 damage
Abilities:

(20% to deal x3 damage)

(has Hero attack type)
Upgrades used:
Finmade Weapons
Murloc Scale

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.description:

bonuses.name: The Hut Rising! [X]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of High Population

After 180 seconds you can spawn Murloc Hut which pereodically spawn murlocs, after 15 seconds spawn huge wave of murlocs and disappears.
(can be upgraded inside this building)

Type: Unit Power / Unique Bonus

upgrades.name: Bigger Hut
upgrades.description: Increases spawn rate and number of units in huge wave

upgrades.name: Neptulon's Blessing
upgrades.description: Replaces spawned units with their stronger version

upgrades.name: Elite Team
upgrades.description: Send bonus unit wave with every hero send

bonuses.name: Questionable Evolution [C]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Ocean Spill

Allows you to make a quick evolutionary leap with possible defects

Type: Unique Bonus

spells.name: Questionable Evolution
spells.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Ocean Spill

You can choose only 1 path out of 4 to evolve your units. Once chosen you cannot go back

Start with max mana
While you have 20-30 mana, gain Overflowing Power
While you have 10-20 mana, gain nothing
While you have 0-10 mana, gain Weakness

You gain 1 mana whenever upgrading your chosen path and every time you hero gains a total of 4 levels
You lose 1 mana every 2 minutes, and once you upgrade Main Hall to Tier 2, you lose 1 mana whenever you finish any research

Type: Unique Bonus

spells.name: Acid Blood (Pick Bonus) [Q]
spells.description:
(Gain 9 mana)
(10% chance to poison attacked unit. 4 dmg/sec 5 sec)
Affects: Figther, Spear Thrower and Tiderunner

spells.description:
(Gain 9 mana)
(+4% Spell Resitance)

spells.description:

spells.name: Tidal Force (Pick Bonus) [R]
spells.description:
(Gain 9 mana)
(+3% Cleave attack)
Affects: Figther and Tiderunner

towerUpgrades.name: Ancient Knowledge
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: increases damage and unlock new abilities
Affects: Murloc Sage

Lv1: +12 damage, has Ray of Negation
dispels buffs on 2/3/4/5 units
(affects organic units only)
Lv2: +24 damage, has Ocean Embrace Aura
+2/+3/+4 armor in 500 AoE
Lv3: +36 damage, has Chain Lightning
100/140 damage to 5 units
Lv4: +48 damage, has Water Shield
absorbs 100 magic damage in AoE

spells.name: Ray of Disruption
spells.description: Conjures a stream of neutralizing magic that bounces up to <Ache,DataC2> times, dispelling units in its wake.

towerUpgrades.name: High Population
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra units in each wave
Affects: All Barracks

Lv1: 1 Murloc Scout
Lv2: 1 Murloc Scout and 1 Murloc Stalker
Lv3: Extra Scout gains Open Wounds
Lv4: Extra Stalker gains Poisoned Weapons

towerUpgrades.name: Hunting Instinct
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage, range and attack rate
Affects: Murloc Spear Thrower and Murloc Stalker

Lv1: +8 damage, +25 range, +5% attack rate
Lv2: +16 damage, +50 range, +10% attack rate
Lv3: +24 damage, +75 range, +15% attack rate
Lv4: +32 damage, +100 range, +20% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: MRLGRL Dance
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: increases base evasion
Affects: All Units

Lv1: +5% evasion
Lv2: +10% evasion
Lv3: +15% evasion
Lv4: +20% evasion

towerUpgrades.name: Ocean Spill
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: increase selected Aura power
Affects: Fortress

Lv1: +0.5x gold and +1500 AoE, +50 range and +1500 AoE, +5% chance
Lv2: +1x gold and +3000 AoE, +100 range and +3000 AoE, +10% chance
Lv3: +1.5x gold and +4500 AoE, +150 range and +4500 AoE, +15% chance
Lv4: +2x gold and +6000 AoE, +200 range and +6000 AoE, +20% chance

towerUpgrades.name: Poisoned Weapons
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: deals damage over time
Affects: Murloc Spear Thrower and Murloc Tower
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: 6 damage/sec for 10 seconds
Lv2: 12 damage/sec for 12 seconds
Lv3: 18 damage/sec for 14 seconds
Lv4: 24 damage/sec for 16 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Water Synergy
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage and HP
Affects: Murloc Fighter, Murloc Tiderunner, Murloc Scout and Murloc Stalker

Lv1: +25 HP, +4/6 damage
Lv2: +50 HP, +8/12 damage
Lv3: +75 HP, +12/18 damage
Lv4: +100 HP, +16/24 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Open Wounds
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: reduce attack and move speed
Affects: Murloc Fighter and Murloc Scout
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: 15% chance to -15% speed
Lv2: 25% chance to -20% speed
Lv3: 35% chance to -25% speed
Lv4: 45% chance to -30% speed

towerUpgrades.name: Water Dome
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: increase HP regeneration in AoE
Affects: Murloc Mage

Lv1: +4 HP/s in 250 AoE
Lv2: +6 HP/s in 300 AoE
Lv3: +8 HP/s in 350 AoE
Lv4: +10 HP/s in 400 AoE

Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Devour (Self Spell)
kills an ally, heals for 100-170% of it's HP
(affects non-Hero units only)

(250-400 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

skills.description: Increases attack rate of mechanical units by 15%.

skills.name: Eruption - [Level 1]
skills.description: Deals 175 damage to nearby enemy land units and stuns them for 2.5 seconds.

Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

(affects Hero units below 30% HP only)

(restore full HP to allies after Ritual is over)
(120-90 second cooldown)
